title: Learn Automation In Sinhala
description:
My name is Mohamed Haashir, and I'm passionate about helping people learn about IT, regardless of their financial or social background. Coming from a rural background myself, I understand how difficult it can be to get into the IT industry, and I want to give back to the community by sharing my knowledge for free. 
Money should never be a barrier to education, which is why I'm committed to providing free video tutorials on IT courses in Sinhala. Even if you have no experience in coding or programming, I'm confident that you'll be able to learn and master these concepts through my videos. One of my core strengths is teaching, and I'm excited to share my knowledge and expertise with you.
I believe that together, we can create a better tech learning community in Sri Lanka. So, let's learn and grow together! Join me on this exciting journey, and let's make a positive impact on the world.

title: Angelo Colombo
description:
Hey there! I'm Angelo, a 35-year-old European investor on a mission to achieve financial independence and retire early (FIRE) with my wife and young daughter.

I've been investing primarily in passive ETFs (stocks) for the last 8 years, sharing my journey in real numbers along the way. My goal is to make talking about money less taboo, inspire more Europeans to start saving and investing, and help you avoid the same mistakes I've made.

Let's make financial literacy the norm, not the exception. Subscribe to join me on this journeyâ€”and welcome aboard! ğŸ«¡

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: Uthayan News
description:
Welcome to Uthayan News, your one-stop destination for comprehensive coverage of Indian news, Sri Lankan news, global events, and much more. We bring you the latest updates, insightful analysis, and in-depth reporting on a wide range of topics from around the world.

Don't forget to subscribe to our channel, hit the notification bell, and follow us on social media for all the latest updates. Thank you for choosing Uthayan News as your trusted source for news and information.

Uthayan is a Sri Lankan daily newspaper that caters to the Tamil-speaking population.  The newspaper was established in 1985 and operates from the city of Jaffna. title: Galle Heritage Foundation
description:
Established under an act of the Parliament (Act no. 7 of 1994), the Galle Heritage Foundation is a state organization committed to achieve following objectives: 
Promote preservation, conservation and development of the Galle Fort together with its historic hinterland, as a heritage property
Promote interest among the residents of the Galle Fort in the preservation of the houses, and other heritage properties within the said Fort and its historic hinterland, and to educate such residents, on the conservation and preservation of the Galle Fort and its historic hinterland
Provide access to, and facilities for the enjoyment of the Galle Fort and its historic hinterland
Promote the general welfare of the residents of the Galle Fort and its historic hinterland

title: ITN News
description:
ITN News is a 24X7 news room dedicated to the reportage of news on various means. We are empowered with a set of talented, skilled individuals who are committed to dedicate their heart and soul towards the betterment of the Sri Lankan society. ITN News is also concerned about underprivileged sectors in society and thereby compiling news reports that caters to the emotional aspect in life.

We provide news in the following arenas.

We have a well interconnected correspondent network which is always on alert and quite responsive.

News here at home, International News, Sports News, Business News, etc will be posted on this page and you will be able to not only raise awareness of the incidents happening around but also to gain knowledge on various aspects.

title: Travel With Wife
description:
Hi Travellers!! Subscribe Now and let's travel together!

Welcome to the Travel With Wife YouTube channel! I'm Kasun, and along with my wife Chamari and our adorable daughter Elina, we are a travel-loving family from Sri Lanka.

Join us as we embark on an incredible adventure across the globe capturing our experiences through exciting travel vlogs. From exploring vibrant cities to discovering hidden gems in nature, we're passionate about showcasing the beauty of our planet.

We are also committed to sustainable travelling and love immersing ourselves in different cultures. Join our journey as we inspire you to explore the world, appreciate the environment, and embrace diverse cultures.

title: Yasith Praharshana
description:
Welcome to My Official Music YouTube channel.

I am Yasith Praharshana. I am a EDM Musical artist in the world. I am from Sri Lanka. My music journey is started on 2021. And also I am a university undergraduate. My university is University of Vocational Technology in Ratmalana. 
However, music is just something I do for fun. The reason for this interest is the desire to create music using the FL studio software. The main reason for this increase in interest is that the designs available on the NCS YouTube Channel are used for various purposes. It is used for various things and tastes like songs. Also, the desire to enjoy the songs of Alan Walker, who became popular, is still there today. Another reason is that the EDM/DJ Artist started his work with FL Studio. As far as I know he still uses FL Studio for his creations. That's how my music journey started. I am still learning about this. 

Thank You.

title: Jaffna
description:
JAFFNA, itâ€™s Stan and Bravin, an iconoclast electro-pop duo through the meeting of fire and ice. The fire is the parisian Stan, a trained chef and self-taught musician. Bravin, of Sri-Lankan origin, embodies the ice. The first is self-taught, the second comes from a classical training at a conservatoire in London. The two are perfectly complementary. 
They came into the limelight through Ripples, their first EP with over 7 million listens, JAFFNA returned on April 20, 2018 with Retrograde, new EP with more retro sonorities. The comparisons are worth what they are worth, but if we had to find one, it might be somewhere in between Moderat and Majid Jordan. 
Abandoning the chill-out and electronica sounds of the beginning, the dark and light Retrograde reflects the willingness of these â€œStranger Thingsâ€ fans to enjoy greater technical mastery to get you moving, especially on stage. Would Jaffna be exactly the place of retrograde and the avant-garde? To be discovered absolutely.

title: De La Salle College Colombo
description:
De La Salle College, Colombo is the only school in Sri Lanka dedicated to the Patron Saint of Christian Teachers St. John Baptist de la Salle, founder of the congregation of De La Salle Brothers of the Christian Schools in Latin: "Fratres Scholarum Christianarum".

De La Salle College was opened on 01 st February 1905 with 22 boys on roll. The object of this School is to give the boys of the Mutwal mission an opportunity to receive an elementary English Education. It is the first â€œEnglish Schoolâ€ to be set up in this part of Colombo North.

title: Sri Lankan Food Recipes
description:
Hi and welcome all ,
Sri Lankan Food Recipes is a channel dedicated to bring the authentic taste of the Sri lankan cuisine , history , culture , plants and fond memories of the beautiful island Sri Lanka. The aim is to reach the people all over the world who had loved and lived in Sri Lanka,  those who visited and feel connected to the Sri Lankan life . Specially those who live abroad and yet they want to keep up the home taste and lifestyle in their location. Also to those who plan to visit Sri Lanka in the future. 
I have shared my travel experiences here for knowledge sharing.
I display the product names I use for ease and provide solutions to the common problems in cooking where you couldn't find the right ingredients . By providing alternatives , tips and tricks I work my best to bring out the " real taste of island ".
I hope you will be benefited from my knowledge of experience I have put here as videos.

Wish you all a great year ahead.

title: EDB Sri Lanka
description:
The Sri Lanka Export Development Board, usually known as EDB, is Sri Lanka's apex organization for the promotion and development of exports and was established in 1979 under the Sri Lanka Export Development Act No. 40.

EDB is the executive arm of the Export Development Council of Ministers, which is the policy-making body of the EDB. It is headed by H.E. the President of Sri Lanka.

The goal of EDB is to provide assistance and create opportunities for Sri Lankan companies to expand their business internationally, thereby increasing export sales and employment prospects in the region. EDBs staff offers consultative services to small- and mid-sized businesses located throughout Sri Lanka. EDBs also sponsors and co-sponsors educational seminars and training programs designed for exporters and potential exporters in the region.

title: Jebathotta Jeyageethangal Tamil Songs
description:
Jebathotta Jeyageethangal was found by Fr S J Berchmans, the headquarters of his "Jebathottam" Trust is locatedin  Kalayar Kovil in Tamil Nadu. He  is an Indian evangelist and Christian. He composes and  sings worship songs in Tamil Nadu. He has composed over 350 songs, mostly in Tamil and a few in English. Many of his songs have been translated into other languages including Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Sinhala, Hindi and English. Fr Berchmans had been singing in the church choir while he was young.
He began composing his own songs after 1983. He released his first four volumes of compositions under the title "Visuvaasa Geethangal" (Songs of Faith), and the later ones under the title "Jebathotta Jeyageethangal" (Songs of victory from Prayer Garden).

At Colombo & Hurd we are experts in the realm of high-skilled and extraordinary ability immigration. Unlike traditional  immigration law firms that primarily focus on corporate representation, we champion the individual, recognizing their potential as key contributors to the United States.

College History | Joe's Sports | Spiritual Life | Interviews with Global Achievers | College News | Instant Updates | A Treasure Trove of Exciting Information

Established - 02nd March 1896 

Motto

In Scientia et Virtute
(In Knowledge and Virtue)

Vision 

Guided by the life, the teaching and example of our Lord Jesus Christ and inspired by the Josephian Motto - 'Through knowledge to virtue' , we are conscious of our mission to serve the people of God.

Mission

To achieve excellence in education, by making college one of Sri Lanka's. best educational institutions, by fostering education which promotes spiritual and human values, thus producing good citizens, who have the knowledge, skills and aptitudes to serve the community in the public and private sector, in the professions and in self employment.

description:

In the heart of the Wadiya, a resting place for those who live off the land and seaâ€”be it fishing or paddy farmingâ€”cooking is a simple yet soulful experience. There are no strict measurements for ingredients, no fixed schedules for meal preparation. Whatever is available that day, even a single curry, is enough to create a delicious meal. The flavors of Wadiyaâ€™s food speak for themselvesâ€”thereâ€™s no need for further explanation.

With that same warmth and authenticity, I invite you to join me on my YouTube channel, "Wadiya Kandy" Here, I share the rich stories of our Wadiya lifestyle, woven into the fabric of our village life. Letâ€™s embark on this journey together!
